section1.title: WHAT ARE SNIPERS?
section1.text1: YOU SAID YOU NEED A SNIPER FOR YOUR FIGHT? WELL, KAISNIPERS ARE HERE. KAISNIPERS IS A COLLECTION OF 3333 OF NFTS ON THE BINANACE SMART CHAIN.
section1.text2: NORMAL, RARE, SUPER RARE & ULTRA RARE!
section1.text3: HOLD THT NFTS TO GAIN ACCESS TO THE UPCOMING SNIPERSWAP!
section1.text4: LIST THEM IN THE OPEN MARKET FOR A HIGHER PRICE!
section1.text5: STAKE YOUR NFT FOR $MIYAGI REWARDS! "DEPENDS ON THE RARITY OF YOUR NFT"!
section1.text6: 100 BNB LOTTERY POT WILL BE DISTRIBUTED TO 50 RANDOM WALLETS THAT HOLD ONE OR MORE NFT'S ( 2BNB FOR EACH WINNER )
section1.text7: EACH SNIPER NFT IS 0.1 BNB TO MINT IN STAGE 1, 0.2 BNB TO MINT IN STAGE 2, 0.3 BNB TO MINT IN STAGE 3. AT THE RIGHT TYP THE AMOUNT OF SNIPERS YOU WANT TO MINT AND PRESS MINT TO CONNECT YOUR WALLET.
